com.ebay.lightning.core.utils

Class SmartCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ebay.lightning.core.utils.SmartCache<K,V>

  • public class SmartCache<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    The SmartCache is a wrapper over Google Cache So what's the difference between this and Google Cache?? 1. On getIfPresent, It will always return cached data, even if it is expired. 2. QUICKER: Auto Updates cache on element expired using a separate thread pool. This will make fetches faster. 3. FAULT TOLERANT: When element expires, it tries to re fetch data automatically and upon failure it re inserts the old element.
    Author:
    shashukla

        Parameters:

        duration - expire time of cache entry
        timeUnit - the time unit for duration
        valueLoader - callback for value loader

      • get

        public V get(K key)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the Value associated with the Key. Serves Everything from cache and reloads cache using internal thread pool
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the value corresponding to the key
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the load operation fails
